hit_dmg_u: The %1$s grabs your arm and bites down hard!!
hit_dmg_npc: The %1$s grabs <npcname> and bites down hard!!
no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s grabs your arm in its mouth, but fails to penetrate your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s grabs <npcname>, but fails to penetrate the armor.

hit_dmg_u: The %1$s slashes you with an integrated tool!
no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s attempts to cut you, but fails to penetrate your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s tries to cut <npcname>, but fails to penetrate your armor.

hit_dmg_u: The %1$s hits you with a heavy sword-slash!!
no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s attempts to cut you, but fails to penetrate your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s tries to cut <npcname>, but fails to penetrate your armor.

hit_dmg_u: The %1$s sweeps your legs from under you!
no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s tries to sweep out your leg, but can't get through the armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s tries to sweep <npcname> to the ground, but can't get through the armor.

hit_dmg_u: The %1$s suddenly slams you with their shield, stunning you!
hit_dmg_npc: The %1$s stuns <npcname> with a shield bash!
no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s tries to shield bash you, but fails to penetrate your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s tries bash <npcname>, but fails to penetrate the armor.
